rationale: EYFS PSED/social concept — requires emotionally attuned adult for social-emotional development.
EYFS concept for 4-5 year olds — AI can deliver structured activities via voice/touch but adult facilitates physical tasks and monitors engagement.
notes: Young children benefit from adult presence; voice-based AI interaction is primary digital channel.
